thread.title: Great place and ideal location
thread.title_full: Great place and ideal location - Review of Hotel Hor, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: JTB_MIB
title: Great place and ideal location
text: Stayed on business for couple of nights. Really nice hotel. Modern and clean. Staff were really friendly and really helpful. Located 2-300 metres from Gare du Nord. Would definitely use again. Lots of eating places in local area as well. Use TripAdvisor for recommendations!
